name: X-Ray Mantis
description:
For hours, this beautiful praying mantis remained motionless on my backdoor screen. It didn’t mind my getting close up with a macro lens and taking a series of detailed photographs. Back at my computer, I mirrored a black and white image, which resembles an X-ray. My diagnosis? A vision of perfect form and beauty.

About the View Portal
The ring-like portal that frames the image was digitally abstracted from the headlamp of a 1963 Chrysler muscle car. The decorative “tabs” make for a unique presentation of all manner of subjects.
